messages.title: JO SWINSON'S PLAN FOR BRITAIN'S FUTURE
messages.content: The leaflet outlines Jo Swinson's plan for Britain's future, focusing on stopping Brexit, tackling the climate emergency, giving every child the best start in life, building a fairer economy, and transforming mental health services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
Generate 80% of electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: GIVE EVERY CHILD THE BEST START IN LIFE
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
Provide free childcare for working parents from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on education and training throughout their lives.
Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
issues.economy: Build a fairer economy by providing free childcare for working parents from 9 months and giving every adult £10,000 to spend on education and training throughout their lives.
issues.education: Recruit 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
issues.environment: Generate 80% of electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.
issues.health: Transform our mental health services by treating mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

endorsements.endorsement: 'Say no to Johnson and Corbyn and all of their candidates. Start the process of building something new!' - Former Conservative Minister Nick Boles
'I’m not sure yet, but I may protest and vote Lib Dem!' - Conservative MP Ken Clarke
'Millions of Tories will now vote Lib Dem because of Boris.' - Former Conservative Deputy PM, Michael Heseltine

examples: Generate 80% of electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.
Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.
